statements: SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE nationality = 'American'
SELECT name, age FROM criminals WHERE crime = 'Theft'
SELECT id, name, age FROM criminals WHERE age > 25
SELECT crime FROM criminals WHERE nationality = 'French'
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE crime LIKE '%urder' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND crime = 'Robbery' ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT id, name, crime FROM criminals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE nationality = 'Japan' AND crime LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM criminals WHERE crime = 'Murder' ORDER BY nationality ASC, name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age, nationality, crime FROM criminals WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, nationality DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM criminals;
SELECT id, name, wanted_level FROM criminals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM criminals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM criminals WHERE wanted_level > 5;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM stolen_identities;
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM criminals WHERE wanted_level > 3 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, name, age, wanted_level FROM criminals WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND wanted_level = 2;
SELECT id, name, age, wanted_level FROM criminals WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY wanted_level DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM stolen_identities WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789';
SELECT * FROM Criminals;
SELECT name, age FROM Criminals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT location, profit FROM Criminals WHERE profit > 1000;
SELECT name, location FROM Criminals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM StolenIdentities ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Criminals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, location FROM Criminals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM DarkWebTransactions WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT Criminals.name, StolenIdentities.identity_number, DarkWebTransactions.amount FROM Criminals JOIN StolenIdentities ON Criminals.id = StolenIdentities.stolen_by JOIN DarkWebTransactions ON StolenIdentities.id = DarkWebTransactions.identity_id;
SELECT AVG(profit) AS avg_profit FROM Criminals WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Criminals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, crime_type FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM StolenIdentities WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789';
SELECT identity_owner, address FROM StolenIdentities WHERE credit_card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT listing_name, price, seller_id FROM DarkWeb ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Criminals ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, crime_type, profit FROM Criminals WHERE profit > 5000 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT identity_owner, social_security_number, credit_card_number, address FROM StolenIdentities WHERE address LIKE '%California%';

SELECT c.name AS criminal_name, d.listing_name, t.transaction_date FROM Criminals c JOIN DarkWeb d ON c.criminal_id = d.seller_id JOIN Transactions t ON d.dark_web_id = t.listing_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT criminal_id, COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM Criminals c JOIN Transactions t ON c.criminal_id = t.buyer_id GROUP BY criminal_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM criminals;
SELECT name, crime FROM criminals WHERE crime = 'Hacking';
SELECT id, alias FROM criminals ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address, crime_type FROM crime_locations WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT criminal_id, profit_amount, profit_date FROM illegal_profit WHERE profit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM criminals WHERE crime = 'Hacking' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM dark_web_transactions WHERE buyer_id = 101 AND amount > 1000;

SELECT criminals.name AS criminal_name, crime_locations.location_name AS location_name FROM criminals INNER JOIN crime_locations ON criminals.id = crime_locations.id WHERE crime_locations.crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT DISTINCT alias FROM criminals WHERE name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT criminals.name AS criminal_name, illegal_profit.profit_amount AS profit_amount FROM criminals LEFT JOIN illegal_profit ON criminals.id = illegal_profit.criminal_id WHERE illegal_profit.profit_amount > 5000 ORDER BY profit_amount DESC;
